DescriptionData.Title: Alan Sloane White Costume Gloves w/ Snap
DescriptionData.Description:
These white costume gloves have a snap at the wrist. They set the standard for well-fitting white cotton clown gloves.
To get the proper glove fit, measure the hand from the base of palm to fingertips. Available in Small, Medium, Large and Extra Large.
Length from base of palm to fingertips - Small: 6"; Medium: 7"; Large: 8"; Extra Large: 9"
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Cotton parade gloves for everyday clowning and performing
These have a snap at the wrist for a snugger fit
